alert.note: Alert for Benewah (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued November 09 at 4:36PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: An Air Quality Advisory has been issued by the following agencies: Idaho Department of Environmental Quality in Coeur d`Alene Coeur d`Alene Tribe An Air Quality Advisory has been issued by the Idaho Department of Environmental Quality in Coeur d`Alene for Benewah County in north Idaho in effect until 5 PM PST Friday. An Air Quality Advisory has been issued due to degraded air quality from wildfire smoke. Air Quality Index is forecast to be Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups. Members of sensitive groups may experience heal effects. The general public is less likely to be affected. Health Impacts and Recommended Actions: Air pollutants can cause breathing difficulties for children, the elderly, as well as persons with respiratory problems. Those individuals who are sensitive to increased particulate matter or smoke are encouraged to avoid prolonged or strenuous outdoor activity during this advisory. Open burning is prohibited by air quality rule. It is also recommended that all other individuals limit prolonged or strenuous activity outdoors.
